description: Note: This annual contains the Hostess Superhero Advertisement "The Incredible Hulk and the Ultimate Weapon!"
name: Starchild

description:
Hidden Menace

The transport anchored off-shore couldn't get away--thousands of men, unaware of the lurking Jap submarine, were waiting to hit the beach! Only two men, part of UDT (Underwater Demolition Team) 38, knew of the lurking killer! But what could two swimmers do against a submarine?

The World Below

A ship capsized -- no survivors were found! Planes flying the South Atlantic route disappeared... others who didn't vanish reported their compass gyros weren't working! What was the common reason beyond these seemingly unrelated incidents! It has been a well kept secret... but here is what might have happened!

Fire Ships of Antwerp (Text Only Story)

Gestapo's Prize

The engineering officer aboard the American submarine wasn't an old hand in the Navy-- he'd been a top research man at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology one year before! Now, he found himself aboard a sinking sub... trying to go down with it!

Below the Story

Our Destroyer couldn't move or she'd go sky high-- Jap planes were coming in low, trying to crash on deck-- I couldn't do a thing but slip the straps on my back, adjust the fins, and get set to go over the side! That was my job-- I was a Frogman in World War II!

A Torpedo A Day

In 1942, beaches along out coast were blackened with oil from sunken tankers... and we were losing hundreds of thousands of tons of ships to Hitler's U-Boats! We in the U.S. Navy had to learn as we fought... and this is one trick we used to even the score! I was on a tramp steamer that was like no other in the world... we wanted to be torpedoed!

Duel in the Depths

A Nazi submarine, U84, the "Sea Tiger", commanded by Captain Erich von Wolfgang, prowled the sea, taking a monstrous toll of Allied craft and even attacking Allied subs! The name was whispered in Naval circles, for the U84 was a shadow, never seen until it struck... a shadow of death...

End of Mission

We were a thousand miles from the nearest ship... or plane... crippled... but the enemy sub was no better off than we were! He'd tried to get away when we first found him in the bitterly cold North Pacific waters... but we found him every time! Now, we were closing in... with a howling 70 mile gale crashing green water over the conning tower...

Prisoner of War (Text Only Story)

Refugee's Return

The tiny Norwegian fishing port was overrun with Nazi troops in April, 1940-- the Norwegians fought bitterly but they couldn't hold off Hitler's horde! One survivor from the little port swam to freedom... he was rescued by a British Patrol Boat, I joined the British Navy... and was on duty on the USS Pickerel, an American submarine, when it entered Norwegian waters in February, 1942... on a dangerous, nearly hopeless mission!

Slow Death

They were pinned on the bottom with the Japs up there beginning a systematic depth-charge attack that could end only one way! Death seemed inevitable... every man aboard the fleet sub was prepared to die... except one, a veteran of too many such attacks, a man weakened by countless bouts with such deaths... chief of the boat, Harry Leeds!

Captain Casey-San and the Japanese Crew

It couldn't have happened if I hadn't been stuck with 195 days of unbroken combat duty... on the 3rd of three straight combat patrols I went on, I finally began to get the twitches (some submariners picked them up before one patrol was over) and to hear voices when there was no one there! And it was about the time the tremble came on that I began to hear those voices twittering away in Japanese... and become convinced that Captain Casey was a disguised Japanese spy and every man aboard was an enemy!

Meeting the Menace of Mogo the Mongol (Text Only Story)

Death in Chains

We were cruising off Norway in the Spring of 1943, seeking targets of opportunity and there were plenty of them as the Nazi patrol boats, tincans, and transports were operating under the protection of their own shore batteries and the Luftwaffe filled the skies overhead! Captain Ball was trying to locate the secret anchorage where Hitler's battleships were tied up when we ran into the nightmare of steel chains... and triggered the warning device that told the German Navy where we were!

Lest We Forget: Oliver Hazard Perry (One Page Story)

In March, 1813, Commodore Perry was in command of a non-existent fleet on Lake Erie, a highly strategic body of water which the British in the war of 1812 had to control! The British had their fleet... Commodore Perry had to build his!

Coastal Raid

We were operating along the coast of Korea... shelling the roads and railways where they were within range of our deck gun, and doing whatever we could to help out cause! Some of the assignments were pretty weird... Like the time, in September, 1951, when we landed just before dawn on the North Korean coast: our mission to find the beach house of Mei Leng-Shi and remove the two small children we would find there! Their father, General Mei Hung-Ka, was a divisional commander with the R.O.K. Army, and he wanted his kids out of commie hands!

Your Role In The Cold War: What You Do In Spare Time (One Page Story)

No Description

Sell-Out

It as the wrong place for old war stories... it was modern Germany, the Western zone, and the scars of war were healing, the rubble of bombed buildings long since cleaned away and, yet... I stayed on my feet despite the cries of "shame!" and "do not interfere, Amerikaner!"... and I told the story of U.S.S. Wandary in the Baltic sea in 1943! Lt. Comdr. Howard Ryall commanding and me, Lt. Mike Magee, a senior watch officer aboard! The Baltic was Nazi-controlled that year... like Lake Erie was American, the Baltic was reserved exclusively for German shipping! But we were there...

The Shiano Dies

The enemy was the biggest ship of war ever built... captable of tremendous speed, designed to withstand more than twenty torpedo hits, designed to be unsinkable by bombs, shells, or submarine! This was Shinano, the super-carrier Hirohi to hoped to scatter American Naval supremacy with...

The History of Gun (Text Only Story)

The Medal Man

On November 5th, 1944, Lt. Allen W. Frisbee was posthumously awarded the medal... the award was made to his widow and teen-age son in Washington, D.C., and we, the crew of U.S.S. Graygar were mustered on deck and an admiral from Cincpac was piped aboard! He read the citation to us, the men Lt. Frisbee had served with! We listened, our faces uniformly solemn... and remembered Al Frisbee the way he had looked that last day at the bottom of Tokyo Bay!
.Superman learns that seemingly unrelated events might not be as random as he thought. Could the mastermind behind last issue's hostage situation play a bigger role against the Man of Steel?
name: Battery: Part Five

description: A new villain Propaganda emerges and turns public opinion against the Man of Steel! Plus, Lois deals with the aftermath of her assignment on the frontlines in the Middle-Eastern nation of Umec.
name: Time Elapsed

first_appearance_locations.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

location_credits.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

description: t's a deadly new villain for the Man of Steel! New Parasites are born, and they have a thirst for the Man of Steel's power!
name: That Healing Touch, Part 1

description: Superman confronts the new Parasites, twins of evil with more devastating powers than the original power-sapping villain! And you won't believe who comes to Superman's aid!
name: That Healing Touch, Narrative Interruptus Secondus

description: The new Parasites continue to feed on those close to Superman! Meanwhile, Lt. Lupe is on the hunt for Ruin, the mysterious man behind the Man of Steel's recent troubles!
name: That Healing Touch, Part 3

description: From the depths of a futuristic world covered in ice and snow emerges E.V.E., a cybernetic being destined to become mankind's only hope for salvation. Born in the darkest recesses of military secrecy, E.V.E. is sent on a mission to rid the world of evil powers that have vested themselves in society. Meanwhile, a chance encounter between Crash, a brash young GearBox Pilot, and E.V.E. is more significant than either could ever imagine. Become part of this truly special event as Aron Lusen and Christian Lichtner (Battlechasers, X-Men, Rising Stars, Batman/Darkness) of the multiple Wizard award- winning team, Liquid!, showcase their brand new creation. Joining them are the spectacular penciling talents of Ale Garza (GenX, DV8) whose phenomenal abilities are sure to take the industry by storm!

Following her programmed directives, E.V.E wages a violent attack to claim the soul of her second target. Bloody chaos ensues as E.V.E is confronted by an insurmountable foe, the governments own cybernetic secret weapon - a robotic monstrosity named Gunner. Meanwhile, Crash's reckless pursuit of E.V.E puts Sam's life in jeopardy and the only question left is will she live or will she die? Don't miss the second exciting issue from fan favorites Aron Lusen/Christian Lichtner (Battlechasers, X-Men, Batman/Darkness) of the multiple Wizard award-winning team, Liquid! and also featuring the incredible talents of Ale Garza (GenX, DV8) who continues to amaze readers with his stunning artwork!
name: Gunner!

description: E.V.E's pursuit of her second target continues at a frenetic pace. Wildly roaring through the streets of the city, E.V.E is not deterred despite the unrelenting pursuit of Gunner, who is intent on her total annihilation! Meanwhile, Crash is faced with the deadly repercussions of his latest act of foolishness as Sam's life hangs in the balance. Make sure to pick up this amazing third issue as fan favorites Aron Lusen and Christian Lichtner, of the multiple Wizard award winning Liquid!, bring this latest episode to life. Joining them once again is the incredibly talented Ale Garza, who continues to receive rave reviews for his beautiful artwork!
name: Showdown!

description: The layers begin to peel away as a sinister secret is revealed to E.V.E, and Dr. Hopkins' life is threatened! E.V.E races against the clock, but her efforts are thwarted as General Kasdan engineers a plan to capture her. Meanwhile, emotionally ruined, Crash makes a last ditched effort to save Sam, but he finds Razor standing in his way! Get ready to catch this pivotal episode as Aron Lusen and Christian Lichtner (Battle Chasers, X-Men, Rising Stars) from award winning Liquid! Graphics, team up with amazing penciller, Ale Garza (GenX DV8), to bring this latest unforgettable issue of E.V.E ProtoMecha to a comic shop near you!
name: Fatal Fury!

description: With the clock winding down, E.V.E must complete her mission in order to save her father's life. There's only one problem, E.V.E and Gunner have been captured by the diabolical General Kasdan! Meanwhile, Crash still has a few tricks left up his sleeve, and he'll be pulling out all the stops to save Sam. The mysterious third target will also be revealed, but this time, E.V.E will be the one taking the punishment! Prepare for this climax building episode as Aron Lusen and Christian Lichtner (RISING STARS, Battle Chasers, X-Men) from award winning Liquid! Graphics, team up with the amazing talents of penciler, Ale Garza ( DV8, Generation X ).
name: Megalomania!

description: With her third and final target eliminated, it seems that E.V.E has completed her mission. But has she? In order to truly save that which she has grown to cherish, E.V.E is forced to face up to an insidious truth, and some titanic adversaries. The stakes could not be any greater as E.V.E must make the ultimate decision that will change her and the entire universe forever! Don't miss this climactic and final episode of E.V.E ProtoMecha, as Aron Lusen and Christian Lichtner (Battle Chasers, X-Men, Rising Stars) from award winning Liquid! Graphics, team up with superstar penciler, Ale Garza (DV8 & Generation X), to bring this first story arc of E.V.E ProtoMecha to an exciting conclusion!
name: Final Conclusion!

description: Clown: A shape-shifting being with his own agenda, who appears as a clown in order to mask his identity as the Violator -- a demon of Hell. He is meant to serve as a guide to the Earth-bound Hellspawn, but does he guide or misguide Spawn?
name: The Clown - part I

description:
The reinvented Clown is terrorizing seeming innocents, but he now has to answer to the Hellspawn. What the Hellspawn doesn't know is that the rules of war between Heaven and Hell have changed. The outcome of this battle may not be what he hopes for. The Hellspawn series begins a new era in the Spawn mythos. The award-winning duo of Brian Michael Bendis and Ashley Wood team up for a fresh, bold look into the legend of the Hellspawn.

SPOILERS

The Reverend Gary Danes appears on the Suzie Booker Show, and spews his racist and bigoted views to the audience. Meanwhile, Clown once again meets an average person, Claire, and they get into a debate over the existence of Hell; a debate the Clown wins by introducing Claire to the real thing. Spawn again is aware of Clowns interference, and again confronts him. This time, the Clown transforms into his alter-ego, Violator, and lets Spawn know that like it or not he is involved in what is going on.
name: The Clown - Part II

description: Fastbender and Hertz discuss the possibilities of a coming war, but Fastbender won't give out any details. Meanwhile, Gary Danes and insults and demeans his host and other guests on yet another talk show while the Clown and Spawn face off one more time, with the Clown telling Al that basically, the battle will boil down to Al and his kind and the Clown and his.
name: Hate Me

description: Corrie's mother (from issue 1) sees a therapist to try and understand her daughter's suicide. Meanwhile, the chat rooms are on fire with talk of Spawn. The Rev. Gary Danes has his own problems as Spawn appears to him and shows him what life would be like had he been born into any of the groups he so despises. This journey from death to torturous death drives Danes insane, and he ends up mopping floors in a place where the blacks seem to look down on him, but yet are far kinder and more sympathetic toward Danes than he would ever have been towards them.
name: Hate You

description:
Overview

Fastbender continues telling Hertz his theory of Ghengis Kahn, while the chat rooms are again busy with talk of Hellspawn. Meanwhile, a deranged jilted lover kidnaps and holds as hostage a woman he imagines to be a local newswoman, but is in fact his ex-lover. He thinks he has performed this heroic act to show his ex-lover that he is not afraid and will do anything for her. Spawn appears and forces the kidnapper to see what he has done, and threatens to return if ammends aren't made. Spawn's efforts are applauded by three heavily armed angels, who are really there for a whole other purpose.
name: Selling Fear

description:
Overview

The war between Heaven and Hell gets uglier as the Hellspawn is confronted by a new breed of angel. Angels with a message from the big guy himself. And we all know how well Spawn does with orders, don't we? An action-filled issue of urban horror from Eisner-winning writer Brian Michael Bendis and the multimedia paintbrush of artist Ashley Wood. ... and, is that Miracle Man's alter ego, Mike Moran?

SPOILERS

Cy-Gor is loose, as the three lesbian angels appear to Spawn, demanding an explanation for Angela's death. They want to know all the circumstances that lead to her death, and want to know what her dying words were. They believe and forgive the Hellspawn, and have great sympathy for the battle he will someday be forced to wage. Meanwhile, the chat room debate continues about the reality of Spawn, as Mike Moran, a reporter, writes a letter to the mayor of New York about the dangerous part of town knows as Rat City.
name: The Big Leagues

description:
If you're interested in what makes the Hellspawn tick, this one's for you. Hellspawn #7 features one of the most unique perspectives into Spawn's psyche you will ever see. Special artwork by Todd McFarlane helps bring to life this singular event. And... a secret group meeting in a church basement reveals just how far and wide the Spawn legacy reaches. This urban horror masterpiece is brought to you by Eisner Award-winning writer Brian Michael Bendis and multimedia genius Ashley Wood. ... and Miracle Man (Mike Moran)?

SPOILERS

Sam & Twitch arrange a meeting with Mike Moran. Having been hung out to dry by the force, Sam & Twitch turn to Moran and offer an exchange of information: The two detectives will give Moran scoops on what's happening within the force, and Moran will supply them with the names of his informants. Meanwhile, John Damascus is in the middle of torturing his predecessor, Jason Wynn, who has lost his mind thanks to Spawn.
name: Shed

description:
From the shadows of Spawn's past emerges his deadliest challenge; an abomination of science, dead human melded with animal, a creature drawn to the Hellspawn by tragic error. That's right, CY-GOR IS BACK! Trapped by an uncaring evil that created him, Cy-Gor has been reprogrammed for a campaign of murder and mayhem, but is haunted by the distant memory of a man he used to know as a friend...Spawn. Be there for these dark new chapters of the Hellspawn's life with artist Ashley Wood and new writer Steve Niles. New creative team. Classic enemies. Total horror.

SPOILERS

With Cy-Gor on the loose, the Hellspawn has his hands full, but still manages to keep an eye on Jimmy, a violent, abusive man whose life is about to change for the worse. Cy-Gor is finally captured, and further implants and alterations are being made by John Damascus. An implant is introduced that causes Cy-Gor extraordinary pain as form of negative reenforcement. Meanwhile, Eden, Jimmy's abused girlfriend, doesn't see that her life without Jimmy will be an improvement, and see's his death as a kind of end for her, as she commits suicide.
name: The Suicide Gate

description: The Hellspawn's past actions are catching up to him in more ways than one. A young woman's death opens a gate, which sidesteps the War's rules of engagement. Cy-Gor is back, reprogrammed and looking for blood under the watchful eye of Agent Damascus, the new leader of the post-Jason Wynn USSG. But something is about to go very wrong. The will of the beast is proving stronger than anything a mere man can hope to contain. Two friends turned deadly foes will meet again and a new player is on the scene. Spawn's world is about to turn upside-down and only a miracle will save him.
name: Chains

description: The Hellspawn is caught in the cross hairs of the raging beast Gy-Gor and begins to unravel an insidious plot that leads back to his own deadly past. Meanwhile, an aging reporter has uncovered a secret that has been in the shadows for years and he plans on dragging it into the light of day for all to see. And in the darkest corners of the city, where the dead have eyes, a young girl has become the vessel for perhaps the greatest evil to ever walk the Earth.
name: Clash

description: A reporter is nosing around the alleys searching for the unholy legend that lurks in the shadows. The back streets of New York are painted red with blood as Cy-Gor and the Hellspawn battle. The battle ape is rewired, raging and out of control in his lust to destroy Spawn. But there is another player with a secret, a new USSG agent named Damascus who will pull the pin and unleash an unforgettable series of events. When the secret comes out, the history of the Hellspawn will be shattered... forever
name: Conflicts of Interest

description: An evil will be born from the belly of a young mother possessed. From this birth will be spat the Hellspawn's torment and rage, and the greatest challenge of Spawn's existence. The Powers are surfacing, crawling from the cuts and wounds of the dying, eager to claim the throne vacated by Malebolgia's demise. But there is another presence on the scene, standing between Spawn and his destiny. A hero lost in the fabric of time and the imagination whose time to re-emerge has come!
name: Call Her Hel

description: The biggest and most-anticipated event of the year! A word spoken. A flash of blinding light. A mysterious hero from the past returns. The New York City streets are suddenly alight with chaos. The Hellspawn stands poised for combat with a Hell-born she-demon called Haella, who challenges the rightful successor to the throne. When the hero emerges, he will stand between the combatants and the history of the Hellspawn will be forever changed.
name: Hellworld - Part I

description: For years the Hellspawn has stood at the edge of the world, lurking in the shadows. He has battled to regain his life while losing his humanity every moment that passes. He has but one fear and that fear is about to be exposed by a mysterious hero from the past. Spawn will come face-to-face with the one circumstance he has avoided since Malebolgia spat him from the bowels of Hell. Today a Hellspawn will cower in the light of day and fight the greatest battle he has ever fought.
name: Hellworld - Part II

description:
The battle of the year continues! Miracleman drags the Hellspawn and their battle into an arcane arena where no humans will interfere. Both Hellspawn and hero are faced with a choice they must confront, and in the end an innocent heart will cease to beat. A common truth will be revealed and a long-time lie exposed. The repercussions will change Miracleman, Spawn and the world forever! Prepare to be shocked.

SPOILERS

Hel tries her damnedest to trick the Hellspawn into losing his patience and unleashing the awesome power and violence of which he is capable. He is resolute until faced with one of his most despicable victims: Billy Kincaid. Eden, the young girl who committed suicide, faces the Hellspawn and accuses him of being the unwitting accomplice in her own death, with a story that brings Hel's motives further into question. Meanwhile, Scary Larry appears with his own tale of Hel's dubious past.
name: Hellworld - Part III

description: Featuring the same core character as the long-running Spawn comic book, Hellspawn mires the protagonist in a dark, foreboding world of grime and dirty secrets. While Spawn highlights a battle between the dark and the light, Hellspawn is struggling mightily to keep the blackness at bay. This book is the stripped-down ugly essence of Todd McFarlane's Hell-born creation. "Hellworld" Part 4, the Conclusion?The heart of man is the place the Devil's in: I feel sometimes a hell within myself. All of Hellworld will stagger at the power of a Hellspawn out of control! What was illusion is now terrifyingly indisputable and the she- demon seducer Hel will come face to face with Spawn on his own terms. The lies are put aside and Spawn will confront the inhabitants of a thousands pits of Hell to rescue one innocent girl whose life he put in jeopardy. This will be the Hellspawn's finest hour ...
name: Hellworld - Part IV

description: Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, The Human Torch in The Icemaster Cometh.
name: The Moon Menace!

description: Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Advertisement, Mr. Fantastic in "A Passion For Gold."
name: The Demonicus Scheme!

description:
Can even the combined power of the Shogun Warriors hope to triumph against the united might of their greatest foes - Cerebus, Starchild, and the Hand of Five? Featuring a cameo appearance by Dum Dum Dugan and S.H.I.E.L.D.

Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Iron Man in the Hungry Battleaxe!
name: Should Heroes Fail...

description:
Shogun Sanctuary is under attack and when the mighty Raydeen is turned against them can even the Shogun Warriors win?

Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, The Human Torch in "A Hot Time in the Old Town."
name: The Insider!

description:
What is to become of the Guardians of World Freedom when Shogun Sanctuary is destroyed? Plus, the startling secret behind the Men in Black is finally revealed!

Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, "Thor Meets The Ricochet Monster!"
Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Spider-Man in "The Trap."
name: The Juggernaut!

description: Note: This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, The Thing in "Sunday Punch!"
name: The Chaos Wars 2!

description: Robotman has abandoned the group, and the Doom Patrol is in shambles. And while Ava attempts to initiate a romantic relationship with Ted Bruder, Fever meets the Purple Purposeless!
name: What to Do

description: Robotman sets off on a road trip to discover America, and himself, leaving the rest of the Doom Patrol without a forwarding address... or a clue. Oh, did we mention the return of the blind samurai named Tycho?
name: No Hope for a Robot?

description: It's the Doom Patrol in the weirdest roles of their lives: characters in a mythic tale of ancient China! And when the group finds out who's telling the story, they may never recover!
name: Once Upon a Time

description: The return of the blind monk, Tycho! He's got a new plan to get back the sword of the seven spirits...accompanied by an army of monkeys!
name: Unwilling Spirits

description: Rick Geary (MAD, National Lampoon) provides guest art for a most unusual Doom Patrol story! Behind the scenes at the production offices of the Doom Patrol television series, a lone fact-checker launches a campaign to make the imaginary TV adventures closer to the real thing!
name: What is Drama?

description: Death knocks at the Doom Patrol's door! Robotman returns, only to discover that the Doom Patrol has been possessed by the villainous Tycho and Nao Yut! Will anyone make it out alive? Plus, the origin of Tycho is revealed!
name: Salvation Through Terror

description: Final issue! In a desperate attempt to save a team member's life, the Doom Patrol turns to Doc Magnus...but is it too late?
name: A New End
